# Cloud Dancer Portfolio Template
> Calm, high-performance developer portfolio landing page with a single-page layout.

This site is a one-page portfolio template. The Markdown mirror provides a clean, LLM-friendly
version of the content. Section anchors map to the main content.

## Pages
- [Home](/)
- [Home (Markdown)](/index.md)
- [Sitemap](/sitemap.xml)
- [Robots](/robots.txt)

## Sections
- [Hero](/#hero): Name, headline, and primary calls to action.
- [About](/#about): Bio and quick facts.
- [Projects](/#projects): Featured work.
- [Skills](/#skills): Primary skill stacks.
- [Experience](/#experience): Career timeline.
- [Principles](/#principles): Working style.
- [Contact](/#contact): Ways to reach out.

## Optional
- [Open Graph Image](/og.png): Social sharing preview.

## Template Creator
- Isaac D'Césares — https://dcesares.dev
- GitHub: https://github.com/idcesares
- Project site: https://cloud-dancer.dcesares.dev
- Repository: https://github.com/idcesares/Cloud-Dancer
